Parameter.name: velocity
Parameter.description: the velocity of the Phidget stepper actuator

Parameter.name: acceleration
Parameter.description: the acceleration of the Phidget stepper actuator

Parameter.name: position
Parameter.description: the current position of the Phidget stepper actuator

Parameter.name: geometricPositionMin
Parameter.description: the min position of the Phidget stepper actuator [mm]

Parameter.name: geometricPositionMax
Parameter.description: the max position of the Phidget stepper actuator [mm]

Parameter.name: resolution
Parameter.description: The step resolution of the actuator [mm]

Parameter.name: current
Parameter.description: The current settings of the actuator [A]

Parameter.name: safeRange
Parameter.description: Defines the offset from min and max position [steps]

Parameter.name: moveInThread
Parameter.description: Activates/Deactivates the background thread for moving. Makes the API non blocking / blocking
